NavDocItem Interface Reference

Interface to elements of the EPUB navigation document. The intent of this interface is to allow callers to either directly access the associated nav element (if this is the top level NavDocItem or to walk the tree of the nav element. More...

import "Readium.idl";

Public Member Functions

integer getChildCount ()
 
NavDocItem getChild (integer index)
 
Object getNode ()
 
DOMString getHref ()
 
Object getAttributes ()
 

Detailed Description

Interface to elements of the EPUB navigation document. The intent of this interface is to allow callers to either directly access the associated nav element (if this is the top level NavDocItem or to walk the tree of the nav element.

Definition at line 791 of file Readium.idl.

Member Function Documentation

Object NavDocItem::getAttributes ( )

Returns an array of objects that is the complete set of attributes for this item, where the array is of the form:

[
{ ns:string, name:string, value:string },
{ ns:string, name:string, value:string },
{ ns:string, name:string, value:string }
etc.
]

where
ns is the fully qualified namespace
name is the short name of the attribute (without prefix or namespace)
value is the value of the attribute

Returns
an array of objects that hold the complete set of attributes
NavDocItem NavDocItem::getChild ( integer  index)

Fetch the specified child of the current NavDocItem Returns null if there isn't one index 0-based index of the item to be fetched

Returns
an object which implements the NavDocItem interface
integer NavDocItem::getChildCount ( )

Return the number of children of this NavDocItem

Returns
the number of children
DOMString NavDocItem::getHref ( )

Returns the href for this item, if any Returns empty if there is no such attribute.

Returns
the href for this item, empty if none
Object NavDocItem::getNode ( )

Retrieve the actual DOM node wrapped by this item

Returns
the actual DOM node wrapped by this item
